column2: comparative: πιο + positive forms (e.g. πιο άγριος, etc.) relative superlative: definite article + πιο + positive forms (e.g. ο πιο άγριος, etc.)
relative superlative: ο + comparative forms (eg "ο αγριότερος", etc)

column1: άγρια ‎(ágria, “wildly”)  αγριάδα f ‎(agriáda, “wildness”)  αγριάνθρωπος m ‎(agriánthropos, “wild man”)  αγριελιά f ‎(agrieliá, “wild olive tree”)  αγρίεμα m ‎(agríema, “wildness, ferocity, bullying”)
column3: αγριεύω ‎(agriévo, “to infuriate, to bully, to become wild”)  αγριεύομαι ‎(agriévomai, “to be frightened”)  αγρίμι n ‎(agrími, “wild animal”)  αγριότητα f ‎(agriótita, “ferocity”)  αγρίως ‎(agríos, “wildly, savagely”)

column1: αγριο- ‎(agrio-)  Category:Greek words prefixed with αγριο-  αγριό- ‎(agrió-)  Category:Greek words prefixed with αγριό-
column3: αγρι- ‎(agri-)  Category:Greek words prefixed with αγρι-
